It changes the standard 'twostate' (<> / <>) functionality of the Sidebar to a 'tristate' (<> / <> / <>) functionality:\n\n# normal tiddler width (default 686px) with a broad Sidebar (showing <>).\n# small Sidebar (with programmable width; default 30em) and fluid tiddler width (showing <>).\n# fluid tiddler width without Sidebar (showing <>).\n\n<<<\n''Note:''\n\n* ''This plugin needs my $:/plugins/tg/layout plugin for general layout settings (available at http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/).''\n* Sidebar layout (''~ControlPanel > Appearance > Theme Tweaks: Options'') @@color:red;must@@ be set at 'Fixed story, fluid sidebar'
('Fluid story, fixed sidebar' interferes with the Tristate plugin!)\n* The Sidebar width (default 30em) can be configured in [[Tristate width|$:/plugins/tg/tristate/settings]] (can also be found in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]], tab 'Tristate''').\n<<<\n", "modified": "20200316130559627", "modifier": "TonGerner", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/tristate/readme" }, "$:/plugins/tg/tristate/settings": { "created": "20140907193931322", "creator": "TonGerner", "text": "!!Tristate settings\n\n<>\n
